author: adapdoaosdaoda
description: Event scheduling polling system with unified modal voting interface, visual calendar images with emoji rendering, and conflict detection. Users vote for all events in a single modal with select menus. Requires ModalPatch cog for select menu support in Discord modals.
install_msg:
Thank you for installing EventPolling! Use `[p]eventpoll create` to create your first event poll.

⚠️ REQUIRED COG:
• [p]load modalpatch (MUST be loaded BEFORE polling cog)

REQUIRED DEPENDENCIES:
• pip install Pillow
• pip install git+https://github.com/jay3332/pilmoji

Note: ModalPatch enables select menus in Discord modals. Without it, voting will not work.
pilmoji enables emoji rendering in calendar images. If not installed, calendars will use text labels (HR, ST, P, etc.) as fallback.
short: Event scheduling polls with visual calendars
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores user selections for event scheduling polls. Users can clear their data by having an admin use the `[p]eventpoll clear` command.
